content: Poopo Lake, (also Lago Poopo), in Bolivia WAS a large saline lake in a shallow depression  in the mountains of Bolivia. Melting of the the Andes glaciers and loss of their waters and drought due to climate change, and diversion of water for mining and agriculture all contributed to its official demise__no.0133, 2018. #SouthAmerica #waterdiversion #glaciers #meltingglaciers #AndesMountains
